p: Phase analysis of polyethylene with four different densities was carried out using an X-ray diffractometer (X’pert) produced by Philips, Amsterdam, The Netherlands. The X-ray source was CuK α; the tube voltage was set to 40 kV; the tube flow was set to 40 mA; the phase analysis was performed in the θ–2 θ scanning mode; the step size was set to 0.05°; the time constant was 1 s. The θ–2 θ scanning mode was applied for fine scanning, the step size was set to 0.02°, and the time constant was 20 s.
